评论详情: The fabric quality is great, and there is no odor. The pants are a little short, but the wash is absolutely beautiful, and they over all look very good on me. They have a little bit of a bell at the bottom, which, if you’re short, will look very baggy as advertised, and if you are taller, they will not touch your feet, but they will still look nice. I suggest them!
These cargo pants were bought to be a Christmas gift for my niece.  She loved them.  Fit great and look great.

These are not as big in the ankles as you'd think. Not jncos. But they are baggy and the pockets are cool. The baby isn't as thick as one would like. Not Jean. But they are cute and great for that gothic, hot topic look. Comfortable. Also not super long. Maybe a 30" inseam. I didn't notice a smell.
I love these so much! Buy them now! They fit great, super comfy, and is exactly the look I was hoping for!
That’s the best choice I made! Sooo beautiful and trendy
Bought these for my 14 year old daughter, was true to size. She thought they were quite stylish.
My daughter loves them thank you! They fit great in the hips and waist and baggy! Good thick material!
Es demasiado ancho su tela es de buena calidad trae muchas bolsas que lo hacen verse muy bonito es perfecto para esas niñas que quieren estar a la moda

I love the jeans. But they were a tad big in the waist. Going to return for a small & see If they work. Great quality jeans. A little long but I am 5ft4 135 lbs, 30 in waist, & 36in hips & can wear platforms & they won't drag. Wish the medium would've worked. But gonna try the small. So comfy. Tons of pockets.

I got a size small for these jeans, yet they fit like a large. These jeans are classified as “baggy”, but they just look ridiculous. I often struggle with sizing as a small, and these jeans yet again prove that point.
Love the strings to tighten the bottom so it doesn’t touch the ground when it’s wet! Got so many compliments
Baggy, supper comfy and sturdy. As a woman i do recommend sizing down. Im M and got an S and they are still too big on the waist, but ill get it tailored soon, still worth my money for the fits
Washed well, heavy duty Jean material, looked great
I’m pretty sure the only people who these are too big for are those who need to stop lying to themselves. The pair that I got are built like a medium even though I ordered them in a small.
They fit good. This is the look she was going for. Love the pockets!
ordered a large hoping they would be huge on me and they ended up being WAY too small and i couldnt even wear them. defenitely order 2 sizes up.

The pants look great! The only reason I'm deducting a star is because the button up is a little weak and seems like it would give out if too much pressure or wear is applied. But overall, good pants, lotss of pocket space.

i love the jeans, the quality and material is good! from looking at the reviews, i did size down and i'm glad i did as surprisingly they're still just a tad bit big but not in a bad way. they're comfortable and sit just a little lower on my waist. the length is pretty long on me since i'm not that tall but i'm happy since you can adjust the bottom of the jeans. i'm definitely going to buy the black pair next!!

评论概述: great jeans, but about the sizing
评论详情: great, comfortable jeans especially for the price. i love the strings at the bottom to make the pants adjustable, so unlike other baggy y2k style jeans the material won't drag along the floor. however, i do have to point out that these jeans are far bigger than i had anticipated. i get a lot of jeans with waist size 36-38 since i'm on the bigger size, so i expected that the large size was going to be just right. however, the large size is actually too big for me and they keep falling. for anyone with a similar waist, i recommend the medium.

These jeans are amazing the texture the amount of pockets these are perfect for teenagers or y2k styles wish i could wear these forever also really comfy might need a belt if you don't like really baggy pants!
These was made for more skinner people 😔 I liked them but it's too small for me(I got a XL)
My wife absolutely adores these loose fitting pants, great quality and super comfy.
It's a bit big but that's probably my fault
The jeans look great. They are baggy and oversized which is what I was going for. The quality is very good! For reference I am 5'7, 116lbs and got a small.

评论概述: So I’m 11 and it fit me good just need a belt and pin up the bottom of the end and I got xs so ya
评论详情: It was actually really good 10/10

评论概述: the equinox of quality and style
评论详情: these jeans are life changing. they have stayed with me through thick and thin. they are the perfect jeans, a beautiful wash undiscovered in your typical department store. perfectly baggy, and uniquely comfortable. my 1 critique- after just a few months of wear, huge thumb sized holes have bloomed on my crotch, extremely embarrassing. will be repurchasing

I was a bit scared to buy this since there aren’t any reviews, but the quality is good. I had dinner before this so I am full and bloated. All the pockets r functional, the ankles r adjustable. I personally want a bit more baggy but this is pretty good and it’s just like in the picture and how it’s supposed to be designed.
